(2 Nephi 12:21)."When he ariseth to shake terribly the earth." One of the final events preceding the Second Coming will be a great earthquake. (Revelation 11:11-13.) "This great earthquake, of a magnitude never before recorded on the Richter scale, will be 'such as was not since men were upon the earth.' (Revelation 16:18.) 'The mountains shall be thrown down, and the steep places shall fall.' (Ezekiel 38:20.) 'Every island [shall flee] away' (Revelation 16:20) as the earth's land masses join together (see D&C 133:23; Isaiah 62:4). 'All nations shall be shaken.' (Haggai 2:6-7.)

"The Savior will make His appearance during this earthquake: 'And then shall the Lord set his foot upon this mount [of Olives], and it shall cleave in twain, and the earth shall tremble, and reel to and fro, and the heavens also shall shake.' (D&C 45:48.)" (BICQ, 102 3.)
